Class ModifyXMLDOM

  • java.lang.Object
    • ModifyXMLDOM

  • public class ModifyXMLDOM
extends java.lang.Object
    Modifies an xml file to include a specific tag, that being scriptingFeature
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Andrew Reynolds

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ModifyXMLDOM() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private static void addScriptingTag(org.w3c.dom.Document doc, boolean jsFile, java.lang.String co)
      Adds scriptingTag to DOM of xml script design.
      private static boolean checkTag(org.w3c.dom.Document doc)
      Checks the xml DOM to see if the scriptingFeature tag is included in the tree
      static void main(java.lang.String path, java.lang.String co, boolean js) 
      private static void updateTagJs(org.w3c.dom.Document doc, java.lang.String co)
      Updates the scriptingFeature tag to indicate presence of 1 custom object JS file
      private static void updateTagZip(org.w3c.dom.Document doc, java.lang.String co)
      Updates the scriptingFeature tag to indicate presence of more than one custom object JS files - therefore the files must be zipped up in order to properly import

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String path,
                        java.lang.String co,
                        boolean js)
        Parameters:
        path - path of xml file
        co - custom object name
        js - true if scriptingFeature should indicate a js file false if scriptingFeature should indicate a zip file

      • checkTag

        private static boolean checkTag(org.w3c.dom.Document doc)
        Checks the xml DOM to see if the scriptingFeature tag is included in the tree
        Parameters:
        doc - XML document object to search through

      • updateTagJs

        private static void updateTagJs(org.w3c.dom.Document doc,
                                java.lang.String co)
        Updates the scriptingFeature tag to indicate presence of 1 custom object JS file
        Parameters:
        doc - XML document object
        co - Custom object name

      • updateTagZip

        private static void updateTagZip(org.w3c.dom.Document doc,
                                 java.lang.String co)
        Updates the scriptingFeature tag to indicate presence of more than one custom object JS files - therefore the files must be zipped up in order to properly import
        Parameters:
        doc - XML document object
        co - Name of custom object

      • addScriptingTag

        private static void addScriptingTag(org.w3c.dom.Document doc,
                                    boolean jsFile,
                                    java.lang.String co)
        Adds scriptingTag to DOM of xml script design. Adds the tag as a jsFile if jsFile is true or a zip file is jsFile is false
        Parameters:
        doc - XML document object
        jsFile - true if indicating a js file false if indicating a zip file
        co - Name of custom object
